Package org.eclipse.graphiti.services

Interface ILayoutService

All Superinterfaces:
IGaLayoutService, IPeLayoutService
All Known Subinterfaces:
IUiLayoutService
All Known Implementing Classes:
LayoutServiceImpl, UiLayoutService
public interface ILayoutService extends IPeLayoutService, IGaLayoutService
The interface ILayoutService provides convenient services which are useful for writing layout features.
